attributes.action: Build our forces to save our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Build four new military bases accross the country. Commision funding to buy 50 helicopters all kinds, AH-64-A Apaches, OH-58D Kiowa warriors, MH-47D Chinooks, all sorts. 30 fighter jets, F-22 RAptors, and more. 700 tanks. 100 armoured personnel carriers. 15 unmanned air vehicles. multiple launch rocket systems, Astor 30 SAMP/T's, transporter trucks and Arabel Radars. High precision snipping rifles, Machine guns, pistols, Automatic rifles, mortar turrets, MEADS, LOSAT's. Military personnel gear, kit, Fund FIST to get it in to service quicker. More funding for the Military. Compulsary National Service for 16-20 year olds.
